oai_dc:dc.dc:title: CO2-eq-emissions of organic and conventional foodstuffs in Austria
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: Lindenthal, T.
Markut, T.
Hörtenhuber, S.
Rudolph, G.
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Air and water emissions
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: To date 74 products (in each case KONV, Bio-ZZU and, in part Bio-EU) have been evaluated: dairy products (47 products), fruit and vegetables (currently 15 products), bread products (currently 12 products). This summary only presents the results of selected products in the KONV and Bio-ZZU categories.
oai_dc:dc.dc:identifier: Lindenthal, T.; Markut, T.; Hörtenhuber, S. and Rudolph, G. (2009) CO2-eq-emissions of organic and conventional foodstuffs in Austria. [Results summary of 74 CO2-balanced products - Executive summary.] Working paper, Research Institute for Organic Agriculture (FiBL), Austria, Vienna. [Completed]
